    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    Facet Commission_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:Commission_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Commission xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" capAmount="100.0000" maxCommissionUnitApplies="5" percent="10" reasonCode="No Show" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1">
    <CurrencyCode>USD</CurrencyCode>
    <Frequency>Per unit</Frequency>
    <ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier objID="person_1">
        <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
        <ota2-0400:OtherID organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</ota2-0400:OtherID>
        <ota2-0400:PersonRef>person_1</ota2-0400:PersonRef>
    </ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier>
    <CommissionableAmount ttaxInclusiveInd="true">
        <CurrencyAmount currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</CurrencyAmount>
    </CommissionableAmount>
    <PrepaidAmount currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</PrepaidAmount>
    <FlatCommission currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</FlatCommission>
    <PayableAmount currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</PayableAmount>
    <ota2-0400:Comment name="paragraph name" number="1234">
        <ota2-0400:Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</ota2-0400:Text>
        <ota2-0400:Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="3456" sort="2345" version="Example String Value">
            <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
            <ota2-0400:ImageRef>image_1</ota2-0400:ImageRef>
            <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</ota2-0400:URL>
            <ota2-0400:Details applicableEnd="2011-07-04" applicableStart="2011-01-24" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveStart="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z">Example String Value</ota2-0400:Details>
            <ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value">
                <ota2-0400:FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="4567" subTitle="Example String Value"/>
            </ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription>
            <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-12-05">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
            <ota2-0400:Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                <ota2-0400:Address>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Address>
                <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
                <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
            </ota2-0400:Email>
            <ota2-0400:Dimensions height="2345" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="1234"/>
            <ota2-0400:File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="3456"/>
            <ota2-0400:Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
        </ota2-0400:Image>
        <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</ota2-0400:URL>
        <ota2-0400:ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="1234" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="HTML"/>
        <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" purge="2011-01-24">2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
    </ota2-0400:Comment>
    <StatusType>Complete</StatusType>
    <BillToID organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</BillToID>
</Commission>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Commission" : {
    "percent" : 10,
    "reasonCode" : "No Show",
    "maxCommissionUnitApplies" : 5,
    "capAmount" : 100.0000,
    "CurrencyCode" : "USD",
    "Frequency" : {
      "value" : "Per unit"
    },
    "PersonIdentifier" : {
      "objID" : "person_1",
      "Identifier" : {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "organization" : "Acme"
      },
      "OtherID" : [ {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "organization" : "Acme"
      } ],
      "PersonRef" : "person_1"
    },
    "CommissionableAmount" : {
      "@type" : "CommissionableAmount",
      "ttaxInclusiveInd" : true,
      "CurrencyAmount" : {
        "value" : 80000,
        "currencyCode" : "USD",
        "minorUnit" : 2
      }
    },
    "PrepaidAmount" : {
      "value" : 80000,
      "currencyCode" : "USD",
      "minorUnit" : 2
    },
    "FlatCommission" : {
      "value" : 80000,
      "currencyCode" : "USD",
      "minorUnit" : 2
    },

      "name" : "paragraph name",
      "number" : 1234,

      } ],

}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        CurrencyCode
        Indicates the currency to be applied to the amounts located in the child elements.
        Details
        Type CurrencyCode_ISO4217
        Example Value USD
        Required false
        Pattern [a-zA-Z]{3}
        Max Occurrences 1
        Frequency
        This is the frequency at which the commission is applied (e.g. per stay, daily). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Charge Type (CHG).
        Details
        Type ChargeUnit_Enum
        Example Value Per unit
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        PersonIdentifier
        Identifies the recipient of the commission.
        Details
        Type Person_ID
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        CommissionableAmount
        The amount on which commission is calculated.
        Details
        Type CommissionableAmount
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        PrepaidAmount
        The amount of commission paid to the agency prior to the service being rendered.
        Details
        Type CurrencyAmount
        Example Value 80000
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        FlatCommission
        A fixed commission amount.
        Details
        Type CurrencyAmount
        Example Value 80000
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        PayableAmount
        The amount of commission to be paid.
        Details
        Type CurrencyAmount
        Example Value 80000
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Comment
        Text related to the commission.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Comment
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        StatusType
        Indicates the status of the commission payment itself (e.g. no-show indicates that a different commission may be applied if the reservation is not fulfilled).
        Details
        Type Status_Enum
        Example Value Complete
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        BillToID
        Identifies a person or company who should be billed for the commission amount.
        Details
        Type Identifier
        Example Value guid12345
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        percent
        The percent applied to the commissionable amount to determine the commission payable amount.
        Details
        Type Percent
        Example Value 10
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        reasonCode
        Identifies the reason why a commission is not paid or not paid in full.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value No Show
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        maxCommissionUnitApplies
        Maximum number of units for which the commission will be applied. This may be used in conjunction with the frequency attribute.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 5
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        capAmount
        The highest monetary value that may be paid for the commission.
        Details
        Type Money
        Example Value 100.00
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
